00028 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #ifndef __I2CM_H
00030 #define __I2CM_H
00031 
00032 #ifdef __cplusplus
00033  extern "C" {
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00037 #include "ht32.h"
00038 
00039 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00040   * @{
00041   */
00042

00045   */

00049   */

00051 
00052 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00053 typedef struct
00054 {
00055   u8 DevAddr;
00056   u8 RegAddr;
00057   u16 Length;
00058   vu16 Counter;
00059   vu16 RetryDownCounter;
00060   vu8* Buffer;
00061   vu8 Direction;
00062   vu8 Status;
00063   volatile bool Locked;
00064 } sI2CM_Transfer;
00065 
00066 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00067 #define I2CM_DIRECTION_OUT          0   /*!< I2C transfer is output direction                               */
00068 #define I2CM_DIRECTION_IN           1   /*!< I2C transfer is output direction                               */
00069 
00070 #define I2CM_OK                     0   /*!< I2C transfer status : OK                                       */
00071 #define I2CM_SLAVE_NO_RESPONSE      1   /*!< I2C transfer status : Slave No Response                        */
00072 #define I2CM_BUFFER_NULL            2   /*!< I2C transfer status : Error caused by buffer null              */
00073 #define I2CM_ARBLOS                 3   /*!< I2C transfer status : Error caused by Arbitration Loss         */
00074 #define I2CM_BUSERR                 4   /*!< I2C transfer status : Error caused by bus error                */
00075 #define I2CM_TOUTF                  5   /*!< I2C transfer status : Error caused by timeout                  */
00076 
00077 #define I2CM_BUS_MAX_RETRY          (0xFF)  /*!< Max retry count                                            */
00078 
00079 /* Exported variables --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00080 extern sI2CM_Transfer I2CM_Transfer;
